summary: Lockerbie is a small town in Scotland that was devastated on December 21 1988 when a Pan American 747-400 aeroplane crashed after a bomb exploded on board.
full_text: Lockerbie  is a town in Dumfries and Galloway, south-western Scotland. It lies approximately 75 miles  from Glasgow, and 20 miles  from the English border. It had a population of 4,009 at the 2001 census. The town came to international attention in December 1988 when the wreckage of Pan Am Flight 103 crashed there following a terrorist bomb attack aboard the flight.
title: Lockerbie
